summary: Provides commandâ€‘line utilities for managing Kedro pipelines, including commands to scaffold a new pipeline or remove an existing one. It defines a data holder for the set of filesystem locations that make up a pipeline (source code, tests, configuration) and implements helper routines for copying, syncing, and deleting those artifacts.
business_intent: Automate the creation and cleanup of Kedro pipeline structures through the CLI, allowing developers to quickly set up or discard pipelines while maintaining the correct project layout and configuration files.
